name: Play 21 - Blackjack Card Game
description:
Think quick and move fast! Play 21 combines Solitaire with the rules of traditional Blackjack.

Work against the clock and create stacks of 21 to clear lanes. Compete against other players for the opportunity to win real money!

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag the dealt card at the bottom to one of the four available lanes
• Get the cards in a lane to add up to 21 or stack 5 cards without busting to make that lane’s pile disappear
• The game ends after you bust twice on each of the 4 lanes or when the clock runs out
• Face off against players of similar skill in 3 minute head-to-head matches, highest score wins!
• Compete for HexiCoins or cash prizes!

WIN REAL MONEY
Download the app and practice your skills with HexiCoins, then enter matches where real cash prizes are at stake!

Entry fees start at $0.15, and in our High Roller matches you can win up to $100!

INVITE YOUR FRIENDS
Refer your friends and get 5 free cash matches every time one of them downloads Play 21!

For every match you enter, you earn Skill Points that you can exchange for Bonus Money. The more you play, the more Skill Points you earn!

FAST PAYOUTS!
Don't wait weeks to get your money! We've made withdrawing money quick and easy. Deposit with PayPal, cash out via Zelle, and receive your winnings the same day.

LEGALITY
In Play 21, all participants have an equal opportunity to win as the player's skill determines the outcome. Skill-based cash gaming with cards is legal in most U.S states, except AR, AZ, CT, DE, FL, IN, LA, ME, MI, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you aren't in a cash-enabled region, you can still enjoy our games by playing for fun with HexiCoins.

ESPORTS PLATFORM
HexiGames is committed to providing a space where players can test their skills against others and have fun at the same time.

We solely provide a platform for Esports competition and have no vested interest in the outcomes of the matches. Apple is neither a sponsor nor a partner with this app.
